screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .a6proj file in FOREVER Artisan 6
screenshot.caption: A6PROJ file open in FOREVER Artisan 6

description: Artisan provides various tools to customize memory-related designs, such as scrapbooks, photo books, and calendars with text, shapes, photos, and other elements. When saving a project, Artisan creates an A6PROJ file to store information about it and saves it in a folder with the same name as the project and other related files.
NOTE: Artisan was formerly Storybook Creator, which Creative Memories initially developed. FOREVER then acquired Storybook Creator and re-branded it as Artisan.
